brief_description: Advances in multiplexed platform technologies facilitated exploration of human plasma proteins in term pregnancies indicating the existence of a proteomic clock
brief_title: A proteomic clock of human pregnancy
description: Advances in multiplexed platform technologies facilitated exploration of human plasma proteins in term pregnancies indicating the existence of a proteomic clock
hypothesis: Term pregnancy gestation plasma proteins track gestational age
objectives: The major aim of this study was to examine whether analysis of plasma collected during gestation of term pregnancy would allow identifying a set of proteins that tightly track gestational age. A second aim was to gain insight into functional attributes of identified proteins and link such attributes to relevant immunological changes.
official_title: A proteomic clock of human pregnancy
